channel.title: Adding an autokick to noclip
channel.description: can any1 post the code and where to put it to make it so when a player types ::noclip it auto kicks them making the command uselss..

item.title: Adding an autokick to noclip
item.dc:creator: @kreef kreef
item.description:
@kreef wrote:

im new to java so u sorta lost me with the public part cus u sed find public…( then add that whole line

which whole line?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 03:47:39 PM[/size][hr]im confused lol[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 03:53:20 PM[/size][hr]yay i got it working,
i searched for END OF FRAME TESTING and added in

else if (command.startsWith(“noclip”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been kicked!");
disconnected = true;
}
